item.title: Precious cargo: the Container Artist Residency program sets sail.
item.description:
Precious cargo: the Container Artist Residency program sets sail.

Aboard commercial cargo ships is where the Container Artist Residency 01 program is finding its abode. Completely isolated from the rest of the world, the Residency allows its artists to work in a remote space with no tangible lines of communication to the outside world.

item.title: What it's like to ride in the Tesla Model 3
item.description:
What it's like to ride in the Tesla Model 3

HAWTHORNE, California - I've had a terrible flu all week. My body aches, my head is pounding, and my throat feels like it might fall out of my neck. Right now, though, I'm riding in the Tesla Model 3, one of the most hotly anticipated cars in the world...

item.title: Drinks: Smoked Manhattan
item.description:
Drinks: Smoked Manhattan

Our good friends at Gin & Luck were kind enough to mix up a giant batch of Smoked Manhattan's for the WC-003 trip. When you can't have a fire, the next best thing is a fire in a flask. Here's the recipe for the mixologist in you.

item.title: Why You Need to Love Yourself More
item.description:
Why You Need to Love Yourself More

I used to believe that love meant putting everyone else and their needs first, before my own. While I do think there is some truth to that, in the sense that being a giving person is one of the ultimate acts of being a loving person, I came to realize that I must give to and love myself first and foremost.
